snippet: Frans Nielsen scored the only shootout goal and assisted on a second-period score by Thomas Vanek, helping the Islanders edge the host Tampa Bay Lightning, 2-1, on Thursday night.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders edge Tampa Bay Lightning, 2-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Frans Nielsen scored the only shootout goal and assisted on a second-period score by Thomas Vanek, helping the Islanders edge the host Tampa Bay Lightning, 2-1, on Thursday night.

headline.main: Nielsen Scores Lone Shootout Goal to Lift Islanders Over Lightning
headline.print_headline: Nielsen Scores Lone Shootout Goal to Lift Islanders Over Lightning
